name: astrodol-pro
title: Astrodol Pro
desc: The premium version of the popular Astro idol starter template, crafted for micro SaaS startups. Built with Astro and styled with Skeleton CSS.
article: The Premium version now features vibrant colors, an upgraded pricing table, and a showcase of featured brands enhanced with GSAP animations. Enjoy a fully responsive design that seamlessly adapts to any device, delivering an exceptional user experience.
